titles.title: To amend section 1505 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for the continuity of the Board of Trustees of the Institute of American Indian and Alaska Native Culture and Arts Development.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Economic and Educational. H. Rept. 104-505.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 239.
Placed on the Corrections Calendar, Calendar No. 15.

action.text: Called up from the Corrections Calendar for consideration.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.

vote.text: On passage Passed by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 3/7/1996--Introduced. Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 with regard to the Board of Trustees of the Institute of American Indian and Alaska Native Culture and Arts Development.
